_sText:
Zm_split_second_b1c Cridets Mapper Crazy[Virus] Idea Shady/Botgod Inspiration scoutzknivez Layout scoutzknivez This map was actually a request for my server by a former member of the Undead-Mafia how ever he is no longer online anymore. It took me over 80 hours to recreate the scouts knives maps and numerous complies but it is finally ready for a public test I would appreciate some good impute please do not post about the authors this is not a decompile. This work is original and yes it does look like scout knives but its only the layout. In the next few days I will have a demo of the map available. If you guys want to check out my server please do so the map is on the rotation My in game screen name Crazy[Virus] and I will change it to the map for a while. The outer admins may not change it if you ask them. A question I get a lot is how exactly the map works. Well its very basic actually players can make a barricade in the lower levels styled after lila’s maps or the may jump around in the choppy upper level. This is a very fun map and im sure you will agree its not a ordinary zombie mod map. Map SPECS -Original Game play -Barricading -Cool Lighting -Decent fps -Buy Zones -No hidden Rooms -Low Gravity -Unique Dust Style A few little notes about the map -The top part of the map has low gravity its some what choppy and that’s the was its intended to be. I’m still undecided if I will change it back so it runs smooth or not I personally like it at its current setting because it allows players to not be able to make jumps all the time and helps even the map out. -This map is not a decompile of any map as I said it took over 8- hours to create so please don’t post anything along those lines . I did all the work to this map by my self over 3 months and I don’t want to have to appeal assessments it takes a lot of work and I don’t have the time.
Check out My Clan
